fallbackErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
fallbackWarningMessage: This process will be executed immediately. I hope you know what you're doing.
fallbackInfoMessage: This process is currently executing. Please wait.
userOkSuccess: Awesome! We successfully retrieved your user information.
userCreatedSuccess: Congratulations! Your user information was created successfully.
siteOkSuccess: Nice! Your registered sites were retrieved successfully.
siteCreatedSuccess: Cool! A new site was just registered successfully.
siteIdOkSuccess: Hooray! Your selected site information was retrieved successfully.
siteIdCreatedSuccess: Congratulations! Your new site information was created successfully.
userBadRequestError: We're unable to log you in with the provided credentials. Please recheck your login details.
userForbiddenError: You don't have the proper permissions to view this page anymore.
userNotFoundError: This user apparently does not exist in our database. Sorry about that.
userTooManyRequestsError: You're sending us way too many user requests right now! Can you wait a bit for us to finish this request?
userInternalServerError: An internal server error has occurred while fetching your user information. Please try again in a few minutes.
userBadGatewayError: A bad gateway error has occurred while fetching your user information. Please try again in a few minutes.
userServiceUnavailableError: We can't fetch your user information as the service is currently unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
userGatewayTimeoutError: A gateway timeout error has occurred while fetching your user information. Please try again in a few minutes.
userUnknownError: An unknown error has occurred while fetching your user information. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteBadRequestError: A bad request error has occurred while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteForbiddenError: You don't have proper permissions to view your sites anymore.
siteNotFoundError: We can't seem to find your sites. Sorry about that.
siteTooManyRequestsError: You're sending us way too many site requests right now. Can you wait a bit for us to finish this request?
siteInternalServerError: An internal server error has occurred while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteBadGatewayError: A bad gateway error has occurred while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteServiceUnavailableError: Current service unavailable while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteGatewayTimeoutError: A gateway timeout error has occurred while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteUnknownError: An unknown error has occurred while fetching your registered sites. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteIdBadRequestError: A bad request error has occurred while fetching the selected site information. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteIdForbiddenError: You don't have proper permissions to view this site information anymore. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteIdNotFoundError: We can't seem to find this particular site information anymore. Sorry about that.
siteIdTooManyRequestsError: You're sending us way too many requests for this site information right now. Can you wait a bit for us to finish this request?
siteIdInternalServerError: An internal server error has occurred while fetching your selected site information. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteIdBadGatewayError: A bad gateway error has occurred while fetching your selected site information. Please try again in a few minutes.
siteIdServiceUnavailableError: Current service unavailable while fetching your selected site information. Please try again in a few minutes.
